edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model

Interface Page

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FormattableObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RdfPage

    public interface Page
extends FormattableObject
    Page objects need to implement this interface. Pages are used only as outgoing objects and are created with data in the repositories database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model.FormattableObject

        FormattableObject.Type

      Adds an annotation IRI to this page.
      void closeAdding()
      After all annotations or iris have been added during construction of this page object, this method is called to finalize it.

      Returns the IRI of the containers this page belongs to

        Returns the used container preference for annotation serialization
        Returns:

      • getNextPage

        java.lang.String getNextPage()
        Returns the IRI of the next page in the container
        Returns:
        The IRI of the next page, null if the page is the last one

      • getPreviousPage

        java.lang.String getPreviousPage()
        Returns the IRI of the previous page in the container
        Returns:
        The IRI of the previous page, null if the page is the first one

      • getFirstAnnotationPosition

        int getFirstAnnotationPosition()
        Returns the absolute position in the container of the first annotation in this page. Numbering starts with 0.
        Returns:
        The index of the first annotation in this page in the underlying container

      • addAnnotation

        void addAnnotation(Annotation anno)
        Adds an annotation to this page and also registers its IRI. Makes no sense in conjunction with PreferIriesOnly.
        Parameters:
        anno - The annotation to add

      • addAnnotationIri

        void addAnnotationIri(java.lang.String annoIri)
        Adds an annotation IRI to this page. Use only when PreferIriesOnly is used.
        Parameters:
        annoIri - The annotation IRI to add

      • closeAdding

        void closeAdding()
        After all annotations or iris have been added during construction of this page object, this method is called to finalize it. Does nothing if the page has already been closed.

      • getDataset

        org.apache.commons.rdf.api.Dataset getDataset()
        Gets the Dataset representing the output of the Page.
        Returns:
        the Dataset
